meanings.definition: The study of microorganisms, especially bacteria and viruses.
meanings.sent1: Microbiologies help us understand tiny living things like bacteria and viruses.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use microbiologies to learn about small organisms that can make us sick.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with excitement as the students delved into the world of microbiologies.
meanings.sent4: Exploring microbiologies is like discovering a hidden universe of microscopic creatures.
meanings.sent5: Through microbiologies, we uncover the secrets of the unseen world around us.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with microorganisms and their effects on other living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Understanding microbiologies helps us see how tiny organisms impact larger living things.
meanings.sent2: Microbiologies play a crucial role in studying how small creatures interact with bigger ones.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed the chaos caused by a mix-up in microbiologies research.
meanings.sent4: In the ecosystem of life, microbiologies act as the unseen puppeteers pulling the strings.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly illustrated the intricate web of connections within microbiologies.
